  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO A SEMI ACTIVE LEAKER INSIDE DOOR 13. UPON ARRIVING COME TO FIND OUT THAT THE TRAILER WAS CLEAR AND EMPTY ALL PACKAGES BESIDES THE LEAKER. UPON APROACHING THE PACKAGE COME TO FIND OUT IT WAS A LEAKING HAZMAT.
